content.question: The work shown is a late-nineteenth-century print by Mary Cassatt. With which art-historical movement is the artist associated? Analyze how the work incorporates the influence of Japanese prints in both style and subject matter.

frqParts.text: The work shown is a late-nineteenth-century print by Mary Cassatt. With which art-historical movement is the artist associated? Analyze how the work incorporates the influence of Japanese prints in both style and subject matter.

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
